subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Minnesota sacked Tony Romo six times and forced two fumbles, while Brett Favre threw four touchdown passes in a victory that earned the Vikings a spot in the N.F.C. championship game next week.
snippet: Minnesota sacked Tony Romo six times and forced two fumbles, while Brett Favre threw four touchdown passes in a victory that earned the Vikings a spot in the N.F.C. championship game next week.
